hero.name: Jaina Proudmoore
hero.flavorText: The Kirin Tor's leader is a powerful sorceress. She used to be a lot nicer before the Theramore thing.

hero.name: Uther Lightbringer
hero.flavorText: Leader of the Knights of the Silver Hand. Best-selling author of The Light and How to Swing It.

hero.name: Valeera Sanguinar
hero.flavorText: Expert assassin. Deadly gladiator. Best knife skills in her cooking class, according to survivors.

hero.name: Garrosh Hellscream
hero.flavorText: This former Warchief of the Horde isn't bitter about being deposed. Not at all.

hero.name: Gul'dan
hero.flavorText: Talented, persuasive and hard-working. Too bad he wants to feed your soul to demons.

hero.name: Thrall
hero.flavorText: Thrall quit his former job as Warchief to save the world and spend more time with his family.

hero.name: Anduin Wrynn
hero.flavorText: The future King of Stormwind is a kind, gentle soul. Except when he's in Shadowform.

hero.name: Rexxar
hero.flavorText: He only feels at home in the wilderness with his beasts. Super secret: Misha is his favorite.

hero.name: Malfurion Stormrage
hero.flavorText: The lord of the night elves is a wise and noble leader. Yes, those antlers are real.

hero.name: Medivh
hero.flavorText: The Guardian of Tirisfal is a force for good. Demonic possession is a manageable condition.
